imdb.title: Kôkyô shihen Eureka Sebun
imdb.plot: 14-year-old Renton joins the rebel GekkoState ship, co-pilots the TypeZero with the mysterious Eureka, and unknowingly becomes part of a grand scheme.

episodes.title: Blue Monday
episodes.plot: A mysterious girl named Eureka arrives at the home of Renton Thurston looking for the Amita Drive, necessary for the proper functioning of her LFO the Nirvash, throwing his life into chaos.

episodes.title: Blue Skyfish
episodes.plot: As a rebel organization called the Gekkostate battles the military, Renton delivers the Amita Drive to Eureka with devastating consequences.

episodes.title: Motion Blue
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Watermelon
episodes.plot: The Council of Sages discusses the Nirvash's immense display of power and how it is connected to Adrock Thurston--Renten's father. Meanwhile, Renton joins Gekkostate to get closer to Eureka, only to find himself at the bottom of the organization.

episodes.title: Vivit Bit
episodes.plot: When a shopping trip with fellow Gekkostate members Talho and Hilda turns ugly, it's up to Renton to pilot an LFO solo for the first time in order to keep everyone form getting into too much trouble.

episodes.title: Childhood
episodes.plot: Eureka's "kids" pull a series of pranks on Renton, dead-set on keeping anyone from getting too close to the woman they call "Mama." Meanwhile, Renton goes out on a dangerous mission without authorization from the rest of Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Absolute Defeat
episodes.plot: The members of the Gekkostate continue to Haze Renton, while Dewey and the KLF battle a new enemy, the Coralians.

episodes.title: Glorious Brilliance
episodes.plot: Renton, Eureka, and the kids meet a member of the Vodarac religion while out shopping. Meanwhile the other members of the Gekkostate hunt a suspected terrorist. Things heat up when the two groups cross paths.

episodes.title: Paper Moon Shine
episodes.plot: The Gekkostate arrives at Ciudades del Sol only to be haunted by Holland and Eureka's past.

episodes.title: Higher Than the Sun
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Into the Nature
episodes.plot: Gekkostate investigates a strange sphere that appeared in the sky. Eureka helps out, despite her declining health, and encounters a new Nirvash shows up--typeTheEND.

episodes.title: Acperience 1
episodes.plot: Renton falls unconscious and has a bizarre dream while the GekkoState battles Federation forces.

episodes.title: The Beginning
episodes.plot: Renton and Dominic go to the city in search of medicine for Eureka and Anemone.

episodes.title: Memory Band
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Human Behavior
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Opposite View
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Sky Rock Gate
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Ill Communication
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Acperience 2
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Substance Abuse
episodes.plot: Eureka has merged with a scub, sending many of the crew into a panic. At the same time, Holland responds to a distress call and goes on a dangerous mission to rescue a Vodarac high priest.

episodes.title: Runaway
episodes.plot: The Vodarac priest that Holland rescued manages to remove the scub from Eureka's body, but the ordeal won't be without scars. Meanwhile, Renton tries to come to terms with the death and destruction he's caused since joining Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Crackpot
episodes.plot: The Gekko crew tries to figure out the best way to tell Eureka that Renton has gone. Renton comes across Charles and Ray Beams and their carrier ship, the Swan, and decides to join them.

episodes.title: Differentia
episodes.plot: On his first mission with the Beams, Renton is faced with a difficult decision concerning the fate of a Vodarac girl. On the Gekko, Holland tries to avoid talking to Eureka about Renton, but he won't be able to avoid the subject forever.

episodes.title: Paradise Lost
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: World's End Garden
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Morning Glory
episodes.plot: Holland's quest to find Renton hits a snag when the Gekko runs into a military fleet preparing to take on the ship. Unable to wait, Eureka leaves to search for him on her own--but Renton might be closer than she thinks.

episodes.title: Helter Skelter
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Memento Mori
episodes.plot: A death in the battle between the Swan and the Gekko has major psychological consequences for members of both crews. Meanwhile, Holland reveals to Renton that he has a past connection to the Beams.

episodes.title: Keep on Movin'
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Change of Life
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Animal Attack
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Start It Up
episodes.plot: Renton's grandfather is put in charge of upgrades for the Nirvash. Improvements can't come soon enough, as an attack on the Coralians results in an all-out battle and the deployment of typeTheEND.

episodes.title: Pacific State
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Inner Flight
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Astral Apache
episodes.plot: Gekkostate attacks the capital in order to rescue Norb, but Eureka's unwillingness to take any more lives hinders the operation. Colonel Dewey is quick to dismiss the assault, not knowing that Holland has succeeded in finding Eureka a partner.

episodes.title: Fantasia
episodes.plot: Newly rescued Norb insists on returning to the Vodarac homeland, Eureka worries about improving her physical appearance, and Holland tells Renton about his first love--someone Renton knows all too well.

episodes.title: Raise Your Hand
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Date of Birth
episodes.plot: A misunderstanding between Renton and Eureka leads to awkwardness for the rest of the Gekko's crew. Meanwhile, Dewey continues his crusade against the Sage Council, and Stoner tries to improve public perception of Gekkostate through Ray=Out.

episodes.title: Join the Future
episodes.plot: The Gekko State crew plays soccer.

episodes.title: Cosmic Trigger
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Acperience 3
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Star Dancer
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: The Sunshine Underground
episodes.plot: Eureka, Renton, and the kids finally make it to Earth, but have no idea what to do once they're there. Meanwhile Dewey takes Anemone to a celebration and tells her about his childhood and past with Holland.

episodes.title: It's All in the Mind
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Don't You Want Me?
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Planet Rock
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Acperience 4
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Ballet Mecanique
episodes.plot: Dewey is able to create a hole in the Scub Coral that Anemone can slip through. Will Dominic be able to stop her from carrying out her suicide mission?

episodes.title: Shout to the Top!
episodes.plot: A young teen who surfs the skies with his ref board grabs the chance of a lifetime when he is invited to join the pirate organization Gekkostate.

episodes.title: Hoshi ni Negai wo
episodes.plot: The fate of the world is at stake as Eureka begins to turn into the next Scub Control Cluster. As an army of Coralians surround her, Renton understands that to save Eureka and everybody else, he might have to forsake his humanity.
